definitions.definition: A day during which the public schools are open , usually synonymous with weekday during the school year .
examples: In modern China, Sunday is not usually a schoolday except around major holidays.

definitions.definition: The part of a day when students attend school .
examples: I couldn't contact my child during the schoolday because of the school's no-cellphone policy.
The schoolday starts at 9:00 am and ends at 3:00 pm.

main_definition: A day during which the public schools are open , usually synonymous with weekday during the school year .
secondary_definitions: The part of a day when students attend school .
